title: World Tourism Day 2015: Billions of opportunities
text:
World Tourism Day 2015: Billions of opportunities Adv: 
Jul 30, 2015 Adv: 
The UN World Tourism Organization (UNWTO) is very pleased to be launching this year’s World Tourism Day (WTD) campaign, highlighting the transformative potential of one billion tourists. 
Ahead of September 27, 2015, UNWTO would like to invite you to speak with a common voice on what matters most to us: tourism’s ability to drive inclusive development, create millions of jobs and build the sustainable societies we want for our future. 
Against this backdrop, this year’s WTD theme, “One Billion Tourists, One Billion Opportunities” aims to raise awareness amongst decision makers and the general public of tourism’s global socio-economic impact and its capability to drive positive change in countries, communities, and ultimately people’s lives across the world. 
UNWTO invites everyone to join them in spreading this message and showcase the power of the travel and tourism sector in a global conversation by using the hashtags #1billiontourists and #WTD2015 in social media.
